name: Bark & Bite
description:
Bark & Bite is a short action platformer made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6.

Those humans are at it again! Soon they will flatten the entire forest. Fortunately the hero of the woods is here to protect us all. With his tree-like resilience and powerful vine whip he will save the day.

Controls:
Arrow keys - Movement
[A] - Jump
[S] - Grapple
